isolated_patterns.description: Implement a layer that translates between different subsystems to prevent the spread of undesirable dependencies and maintain clean domain boundaries

isolated_patterns.description: Eliminate resource contention by giving each node exclusive ownership of its data and compute resources

isolated_patterns.description: Compose multiple GraphQL services into a unified API gateway to reduce client round trips

isolated_patterns.description: Architecture pattern that isolates failures by partitioning systems into independent cells with shared-nothing design

isolated_patterns.description: Understanding the fundamental trade-offs in distributed systems design

isolated_patterns.name: Event-driven Architecture
isolated_patterns.description: Architectural pattern where components communicate through events, enabling loose coupling and scalability

isolated_patterns.name: Ambassador
isolated_patterns.description: Create a helper service that sends network requests on behalf of a consumer service, handling complex communication patterns and protocol translations

isolated_patterns.description: Automate deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications using orchestration platforms like Kubernetes

isolated_patterns.description: Incrementally replace legacy systems by gradually routing functionality to new implementations

isolated_patterns.description: Manage infrastructure and application deployments through Git-based workflows with automated synchronization and rollback capabilities

isolated_patterns.name: Sidecar
isolated_patterns.description: Container-based separation of concerns for cross-cutting infrastructure capabilities

isolated_patterns.name: Lambda Architecture
isolated_patterns.description: Hybrid approach combining batch and stream processing to handle both historical and real-time data with eventual consistency

isolated_patterns.name: Backends For Frontends (bff)
isolated_patterns.description: Create purpose-built backend services for specific frontend applications, optimizing API design for each client's unique needs

isolated_patterns.description: On-premise and cloud integration

isolated_patterns.description: Systematic identification and analysis of potential security threats during system design

isolated_patterns.name: Api Security Gateway
isolated_patterns.description: Centralized security enforcement point for API authentication, authorization, and threat protection

isolated_patterns.name: Zero Trust Architecture
isolated_patterns.description: Never trust, always verify - comprehensive security model that eliminates implicit trust

isolated_patterns.name: Secrets Management
isolated_patterns.description: Secure storage, rotation, and distribution of sensitive credentials and configuration data

isolated_patterns.name: Hybrid Logical Clocks (hlc)
isolated_patterns.description: Combine physical timestamps with logical counters to achieve causally consistent timestamps that are close to wall-clock time while handling clock skew

isolated_patterns.name: Emergent Leader
isolated_patterns.description: Gossip-based leadership emergence without explicit elections in distributed systems

isolated_patterns.name: Distributed Queue
isolated_patterns.description: Reliable message queuing across multiple nodes with guarantees for ordering, delivery, and fault tolerance

isolated_patterns.name: Leader-follower
isolated_patterns.description: Coordination pattern for managing distributed state with a single source of truth

isolated_patterns.name: Two-phase Commit (2pc)
isolated_patterns.description: Distributed transaction coordination with atomic commit protocol

isolated_patterns.name: Vector Clocks
isolated_patterns.description: Logical timestamps for tracking causality in distributed systems

isolated_patterns.name: Consensus Patterns
isolated_patterns.description: Achieve agreement in distributed systems

isolated_patterns.name: Generation Clock
isolated_patterns.description: Monotonic counter to detect stale leaders and prevent split-brain in distributed systems

isolated_patterns.name: Cas (compare-and-swap)
isolated_patterns.description: Lock-free atomic operation for concurrent data structures

Logical Clocks (lamport Clocks)
isolated_patterns.description: Order events in distributed systems without synchronized physical clocks using happens-before relationships

isolated_patterns.name: Distributed Lock
isolated_patterns.description: Mutual exclusion primitive for coordinating access to shared resources across distributed nodes

isolated_patterns.name: Lease
isolated_patterns.description: Time-bound resource ownership with automatic expiration for distributed systems reliability

isolated_patterns.name: State Watch (change Notification)
isolated_patterns.description: Distributed mechanism for monitoring state changes and notifying interested parties in real-time

isolated_patterns.name: Leader Election
isolated_patterns.description: Distributed coordination pattern for selecting a single node to perform critical operations and avoid split-brain scenarios

isolated_patterns.name: Actor Model
isolated_patterns.description: Message-passing concurrency model with isolated actors communicating asynchronously

isolated_patterns.name: Clock Synchronization
isolated_patterns.description: Achieving consistent time across distributed nodes despite clock drift and network delays

isolated_patterns.name: Low-water/high-water Marks
isolated_patterns.description: Flow control boundaries for distributed systems replication, buffering, and resource management

isolated_patterns.name: Cost Optimization Patterns
isolated_patterns.description: Battle-tested patterns for optimizing cloud infrastructure and operational costs

isolated_patterns.name: Spot Instance Management
isolated_patterns.description: Systematic approach to leveraging low-cost spot instances while maintaining application reliability

isolated_patterns.name: Resource Rightsizing
isolated_patterns.description: Continuous optimization of cloud resources to match actual usage patterns and performance requirements

isolated_patterns.name: Finops
isolated_patterns.description: Implement financial operations practices to optimize cloud costs through visibility, accountability, and continuous optimization

isolated_patterns.name: Spatial Indexing
isolated_patterns.description: Geospatial data structures for efficient location queries

isolated_patterns.name: Shared Database
isolated_patterns.description: Multiple services share a single database instance for data persistence

isolated_patterns.name: Polyglot Persistence
isolated_patterns.description: Using different data storage technologies for different domain requirements

isolated_patterns.name: Data Lakehouse
isolated_patterns.description: Combine data lake flexibility with data warehouse performance for unified analytics architecture supporting both BI and ML workloads

isolated_patterns.name: Double-entry Ledger
isolated_patterns.description: Financial bookkeeping pattern ensuring transaction integrity

isolated_patterns.name: Distributed Storage
isolated_patterns.description: Patterns and techniques for storing and managing data across multiple nodes in distributed systems

isolated_patterns.name: Eventual Consistency
isolated_patterns.description: A consistency model where distributed data converges to a consistent state over time

isolated_patterns.name: Stream Processing
isolated_patterns.description: Process continuous streams of data in real-time using distributed stream processing frameworks for immediate insights and actions

isolated_patterns.name: Segmented Log
isolated_patterns.description: Breaking append-only logs into manageable segments for efficient storage, compaction, and retention

isolated_patterns.name: Read Repair
isolated_patterns.description: Technique for detecting and fixing data inconsistencies opportunistically during read operations

isolated_patterns.name: Data Lake
isolated_patterns.description: Centralized repository storing vast amounts of raw data in native format for flexible analysis

isolated_patterns.name: Bloom Filter
isolated_patterns.description: Space-efficient probabilistic data structure for fast set membership testing with controlled false positive rates

isolated_patterns.name: Tunable Consistency
isolated_patterns.description: Adjust consistency levels dynamically based on application requirements and trade-offs

isolated_patterns.name: Materialized View
isolated_patterns.description: Pre-compute and store query results for instant access to complex aggregations and joins

isolated_patterns.name: Lsm Tree (log-structured Merge Tree)
isolated_patterns.description: Write-optimized storage engine that converts random writes to sequential writes through buffering and merging

isolated_patterns.name: Merkle Trees
isolated_patterns.description: Cryptographic tree structure for efficient data verification and synchronization

isolated_patterns.name: Cqrs
isolated_patterns.description: Command Query Responsibility Segregation for scalable systems

isolated_patterns.name: Write-ahead Log (wal)
isolated_patterns.description: Ensuring durability by logging changes before applying them - the foundation of crash recovery in databases

isolated_patterns.name: Data Mesh
isolated_patterns.description: Decentralized data architecture with domain ownership

isolated_patterns.name: Consistent Hashing
isolated_patterns.description: Load distribution algorithm that minimizes reorganization when nodes are added or removed

isolated_patterns.name: Crdt (conflict-free Replicated Data Types)
isolated_patterns.description: Data structures that automatically resolve conflicts in distributed systems

isolated_patterns.name: Delta Sync
isolated_patterns.description: Synchronize data by transmitting only changes (deltas) instead of full datasets to minimize bandwidth and improve performance

isolated_patterns.name: Idempotency
isolated_patterns.description: Ensuring operations can be safely retried without side effects

isolated_patterns.name: Feature Store
isolated_patterns.description: Centralized repository for storing, managing, and serving ML features with versioning, lineage tracking, and consistent access patterns

isolated_patterns.name: Model Serving At Scale
isolated_patterns.description: Deploy and scale machine learning models for high-performance inference with automatic scaling, load balancing, and resource optimization

isolated_patterns.name: Model Versioning And Rollback
isolated_patterns.description: Manage ML model versions with automated rollback, A/B testing, and comprehensive audit trails for production model deployments

isolated_patterns.name: Distributed Training
isolated_patterns.description: Scale ML model training across multiple compute resources using parallel and distributed computing techniques for faster training and handling larger datasets

isolated_patterns.name: Ml Pipeline Orchestration
isolated_patterns.description: Automate and orchestrate complex ML workflows from data ingestion through model deployment with dependency management, error handling, and monitoring

isolated_patterns.name: Blue-green Deployment
isolated_patterns.description: Zero-downtime deployment pattern using two identical production environments

isolated_patterns.name: Canary Release
isolated_patterns.description: Gradual rollout strategy that reduces risk by testing new versions with a small subset of users

isolated_patterns.name: Deployment Patterns
isolated_patterns.description: Battle-tested deployment patterns for reliable software delivery

isolated_patterns.name: Feature Flags
isolated_patterns.description: Runtime control system for enabling/disabling features without code deployment

isolated_patterns.name: Canary Deployment
isolated_patterns.description: Gradual rollout with early failure detection

isolated_patterns.name: Serverless Event Processing
isolated_patterns.description: Process events using serverless functions that automatically scale from zero to handle varying loads without managing infrastructure

isolated_patterns.name: Geo-distribution
isolated_patterns.description: Distributes data and compute across geographic regions for performance, availability, and compliance

isolated_patterns.name: Multi-region Architecture
isolated_patterns.description: Deployment pattern that spans multiple geographic regions for disaster recovery and latency optimization

isolated_patterns.name: Sharding (data Partitioning)
isolated_patterns.description: Horizontal partitioning strategy for distributing data across multiple database instances

isolated_patterns.name: Horizontal Pod Autoscaler
isolated_patterns.description: Kubernetes autoscaling

isolated_patterns.name: Shuffle Sharding
isolated_patterns.description: Isolation technique to prevent cascade failures

isolated_patterns.name: Tile Caching
isolated_patterns.description: Efficient caching strategy for map tiles and spatial data at multiple zoom levels

isolated_patterns.name: Backpressure
isolated_patterns.description: Flow control mechanism that prevents system overload by limiting upstream request rates

isolated_patterns.name: Queues & Stream Processing
isolated_patterns.description: Decouple producers from consumers using message queues and event streams

isolated_patterns.name: Analytics At Scale
isolated_patterns.description: High-performance analytics architecture for processing massive datasets with low latency insights

isolated_patterns.name: Geo-replication
isolated_patterns.description: Replicate data across geographical regions for global availability and disaster recovery

isolated_patterns.name: Auto-scaling
isolated_patterns.description: Dynamic resource management pattern that adjusts capacity based on demand metrics

isolated_patterns.name: Database Per Service
isolated_patterns.description: Microservices data isolation

isolated_patterns.name: Edge Computing/iot Patterns
isolated_patterns.description: Optimize distributed systems for edge devices and IoT deployments where latency and connectivity matter

isolated_patterns.name: Request Batching/pipelining
isolated_patterns.description: Group multiple requests together to amortize fixed costs and improve throughput

isolated_patterns.name: Chunking
isolated_patterns.description: Break large datasets or operations into smaller, manageable pieces for improved performance, memory usage, and fault tolerance

isolated_patterns.name: Cdn
isolated_patterns.description: Content delivery at edge

isolated_patterns.name: Priority Queue
isolated_patterns.description: Distributed priority queue systems that process messages based on importance rather than arrival order

isolated_patterns.name: Geographic Load Balancing
isolated_patterns.description: Distribute load globally

isolated_patterns.name: Rate Limiting
isolated_patterns.description: Control request flow to protect systems from overload while ensuring fair resource allocation

isolated_patterns.name: Load Balancing
isolated_patterns.description: Traffic distribution pattern that spreads requests across multiple backend instances

isolated_patterns.name: Scatter-gather
isolated_patterns.description: Parallel request distribution and result aggregation pattern for efficient distributed processing

isolated_patterns.name: Url Normalization
isolated_patterns.description: Standardizing URLs into canonical forms to prevent duplication and improve system efficiency

isolated_patterns.name: Publish-subscribe
isolated_patterns.description: Decoupled messaging pattern where publishers send messages to topics and subscribers receive messages based on their interests

isolated_patterns.name: Api Gateway
isolated_patterns.description: Unified entry point for microservices providing routing, authentication, and cross-cutting concerns

isolated_patterns.name: Service Registry
isolated_patterns.description: Central repository for service metadata, schemas, and versioning in distributed systems

isolated_patterns.name: Service Mesh
isolated_patterns.description: Infrastructure layer providing service-to-service communication, security, and observability

isolated_patterns.name: Grpc
isolated_patterns.description: High-performance, cross-platform RPC framework using Protocol Buffers and HTTP/2

isolated_patterns.name: Service Discovery
isolated_patterns.description: Dynamic service location

isolated_patterns.name: Configuration Management
isolated_patterns.description: Centralized config

Split-brain Detection & Resolution
isolated_patterns.description: Detect and resolve network partitions that divide a distributed system into isolated segments

isolated_patterns.description: Sophisticated timeout strategies
